title: Save Scoles / Kyssa Stewf Farvl
content:
Seems there are plenty of us who will miss having Stewf on this continent. Instead of trying to post to the News section. Feel free to wish Stewf well from this thread. And while you are at it, [buy a t-shirt](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093221/http:/www.pixeltees.com/shop/typophile/detail/?shirt=20030912-024112-2615796609&&c=20030919-114743-5463053101&b=1%7C%7Cdefault%7C6) to show your love. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093221im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
I'll miss you Stewf. Ah well, we'll always have Typophile and Typographica.
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
I still don't understand how he can say on typographica that he already moved when his AIM account reveal that his computer is still connected.   
   
Anyway, bienvenue en Europe. Au revoir l'Am

**Tiffany,**   
europe isnt that bad. Its actually quite ok, you should come too!   
   
--Jacques
..and it's not cold either....and there's no polar bears on the streets... I've been to NYC in the winter..now that's cold.

Just got my Stewf shirt today. The image is pretty cool, and though I'm waiting anxiously for these print-on-demand places like Pixeltees and CafePress to get past heat transfers for their shirts, I will say that at least they cut around the transfer so it isn't some big nearly transparent square on the shirt and instead looks more like old-school iron-on.
Chesh, what kind of T-shirt do they use?

Fruit of the Loom heavy cotton.   
   
I'd like to amend an earlier statement -- the image is not just pretty cool, it's way cool.

The man survived the 168 hours without the internet!   
   
Hi stephen, welcome on the other side!   
   
---Jacques

Stephen, why did they deport you to this cold and dark part of the world?   
In summer it's great though, all ten days of it.   
The other pixel-tee is brilliant too...

I'm Scandinavian, so it's okay...   
It's okay, right?   
isn't it?   
oh.   
(there was that white stuff covering the lawn this morning.)

Kenn, we swedes forgive you.   
After all you are danish, and thus doesn't know better ;)

How many Swedes are there? My god I am surrounded.   
   
Gerald Giampa

Stewf, have a great time in Sweden!   
   
But wait. No polar bears on the streets?! Why are you even going? =)

Today is the day that Stewf sails to Sweden (sounds more authentic). Aw Shucks.   
   
Jacques. Ooh Dear, you misunderstood me. If I had my way I'd be there right now. ;^)

If I may be so bald (!) to [quote myself](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093221/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3221.html#POST8934). The only   
downside will be that both moderators for the Type   
Identification Board are located in the same time   
zone now, so theoretically I should move to the   
Americas for a year in order to secure our 24 hours   
satisfaction guaranteed no refunds type ID service.   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093221im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/wink.gif)

Stewf sez he misses us all and says hello! He expects   
his Powerbook on Monday.   
   
 ![Hello_to_all.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093221im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/16915.gif)

You all are real pals. Thanks for your warm words   
and cold cash.   
   
"Way cool" Dave? Hmm. I might have to get my   
hands on one of these tees. (Be assured, I'll   
only buy it as a goofy gift for a friend. There   
are few things as lame as a guy wearing a shirt   
with his own visage on it.)
Thank you Jacques. It was a long, lonely ride.

I had a nice chat with Stewf during lunch break\* while   
he was at [Stefan Hattenbach](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093221/http:/stewf.blogs.com/photos/fotos/capture_00003.html)'s. He still hasn't got his   
PowerBook, but [from the looks of it](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093221/http:/stewf.blogs.com/photos/fotos/capture_00008.html) he's surviving the   
cold turkey pretty well.   
   
PS Don't you agree he looks kewl when he's [a bit bearded](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093221/http:/stewf.blogs.com/photos/fotos/capture_00010.html)? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093221im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
\*while most of you were sleeping. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093221im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/wink.gif)
Oooh, Kenn's gonna get his

Best of luck, best wishes, stay Stewf, dress warm,   
see you next year...   
   
bj
